name: gap-hub-enquiryform
author: ay@gaphub

sections.description:
gap-hub-enquiryform WordPress plugin can be used as contact form , enquiry form ,sending email ,feedback form and other mailing form functionality.

To read more about ‘gap-hub-enquiryform plugin’ visit at http://wordpressplugins.gaphub.com/portfolio_item/ghenquiryform.

Shortcuts

1.To use this plugin write only the shortcut [gh_enquiryform] on your page or post.
sections.installation:
Installation procedure:
1. Deactivate plugin if you have the previous version installed.
2. Extract “gh-enquiryfrm.zip” archive content to the “/wp-content/plugins/gh-enquiryfrm” directory.
3. Activate ” gap-hub-enquiryform” plugin via ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress admin menu.
4. Go to the “gh-enquiryform” admin menu and change your receipt email,thanks message and confirmation message.
